title: How Advocates Won Marriage Equality
teaser: As the Supreme Court is set to take up the issue of Same Sex Marriage equality this month, Kathleen is joined by the national campaign director for Freedom to Marry. In his book, Winning Marriage , he lets the reader in on the inner working of an advocacy movement that included legislative, legal, and electoral battles over a decade.
